subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.4 released
msgSnippet: Paul, That s great.  I ve seen some slick stuff done with Theories in Groovy.  What is the error message if a line like this fails? assert languages[ tom ] ==
messageBody:
Paul,

That's great. I've seen some slick stuff done with Theories in
Groovy. What is the error message if a line like this fails?

assert languages['tom'] == ["Java", "Groovy"]

Do you get an informative message? Thanks,

David Saff

On 7/21/07, Paul King <paulk@...> wrote:
> David Saff wrote:
> > We're very pleased to announce the release of JUnit 4.4.
>
> Well done JUnit team!
>
> I updated the Using Groovy with JUnit 4 page to show off some
> of the new features:
>
> http://groovy.codehaus.org/Using+JUnit+4+with+Groovy
>
> Cheers, Paul.
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
